content:
Both Amazon and Ulta offer free shipping on beauty products, but there are some conditions to be aware of:

**Amazon:**

* Free shipping is available on orders over $25 for Prime members.
* If you're not a Prime member, you can get free shipping on orders over $25, but it may take 5-8 business days to arrive.
* Amazon often offers free shipping on specific products, including beauty items, so be sure to check the product page for eligibility.

**Ulta:**

* Free shipping is available on orders over $35.
* Ulta offers free shipping on all orders for Ultamate Rewards members (their loyalty program).
* Ulta often runs promotions and sales that include free shipping, so keep an eye on their website for those deals.

**Tips:**

* If you're not a Prime member on Amazon, consider signing up for a free trial or membership to get free shipping on your order.
* On Ulta's website, sign in to your account or create one to get free shipping on orders over $35.
* Both Amazon and Ulta offer in-store pickup for online orders, which can be a great option if you need the product quickly and have a store nearby.

Compare the prices on both websites, and don't forget to factor in the shipping costs (if applicable) to make an informed decision.

Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with!
